main.name: Aaron Ray
main.description: My passion is the never-ending quest for knowledge and learning. As well as helping others on their own paths. I've been around, ya know...
main.bio: I have been in the entertainment, media and technology business all my life. As a top manager, I've represented the biggest and most celebrated stars of all time, while using that information to build new businesses, produce content, start distribution companies and raising financing. They have finally become one and I'm ready to take it to the Metaverse.
main.contactmessage: If you're looking for me, here's the dope.

work.title: Training Program/Assistant
work.description: Trained under legendary manager Sandy Gallin in management, dealmaking, royalties and script development for crossover clients.

work.title: Director of Development
work.description: Worked to identify, acquire, develop and produce major studio feature films. Handled hiring and reassignment of writers, scripts, books and underlying rights, as well as original stories. ran auctions and several productions.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
